title: Food Sharing Management
description: A full-stack donation platform allowing users to donate surplus food or request donations through a role-based dashboard system.
features: Food posting with status updates, images, and expiration
Admin tools to monitor and manage users and donations
challenges: Managing real-time updates of donation statuses
Handling authentication and maintaining user sessions
futurePlans: Add real-time chat between donors and receivers
Integrate push/email notifications for activity alerts
Mobile-responsive PWA version for easier usage

title: Garden Tips Share
description: A blog forum where gardening enthusiasts can post, interact, and explore tips in various categories. Built with a strong focus on user-friendly content sharing and community interaction.
features: Create, edit, and delete your own blog posts
challenges: Managing blog CRUD operations securely with Firebase Auth
Filtering posts dynamically by category and search terms
Maintaining Firebase rules for user-based data access
futurePlans: Add like and comment systems to enhance engagement
Allow image uploads in blog posts

title: Appstore
description: A modern platform for developers to showcase their apps. Users can browse categorized apps, and admins can verify and manage submissions.
features: Separate login for developers and admins
App upload with images, description, category, and tags
Admin panel for approving, rejecting, or removing apps
challenges: Handling role-based access and authorization cleanly
Building a dashboard with app preview & action controls
Maintaining a streamlined review workflow for apps
futurePlans: Build download tracking and rating system
Add support for downloading APK files or external links
